Package view.TUI

Class TUIdraw

java.lang.Object
view.TUI.TUIdraw
final class TUIdraw extends Object
This class contains all the methods used to draw the TUI

  • Method Details

    • drawGrid

      static void drawGrid(int startX, int startY, int gridRowDim, int gridColDim, char[][] canvas, int[][] canvasColor)
      This method is used to draw grids of different shape and size based on its parameters
      Parameters:
      startX - integer representing start horizontal coordinate
      startY - integer representing start vertical coordinate
      gridRowDim - integer representing row dimension of the grid
      gridColDim - integer representing column dimension of the grid
      canvas - 2d array of characters representing the pixels
      canvasColor - 2d array of integers representing the color of the pixels

    • drawGridContents

      static void drawGridContents(int startX, int startY, Tile[][] contents, char[][] canvas, int[][] canvasColor)
      Parameters:
      startX - x coordinate of the start of the grid
      startY - y coordinate of the start of the grid
      contents - 2d array of tiles representing the contents of the grid
      canvas - 2d array of characters representing the pixels
      canvasColor - 2d array of integers representing the color of the pixels

    • drawString

      static void drawString(String toDraw, int row, int startCol, int colour, int size, char[][] canvas, int[][] canvasColor)
      This method draws a String from the start coordinates
      Parameters:
      toDraw - String to draw
      row - integer representing start row coordinate
      startCol - integer representing start column coordinate
      colour - integer representing color of the String to be drawn
      size - size the drawn String can occupy
      canvas - 2d array of characters representing the pixels
      canvasColor - 2d array of integers representing the color of the pixels

    • drawGameEnd

      static void drawGameEnd(Map<String,Integer> points, char[][] canvas, int[][] canvasColor)
      This method draws the endgame screen
      Parameters:
      points - Map that associates Player ID to its points
      canvas - 2d array of characters representing the pixels
      canvasColor - 2d array of integers representing the color of the pixels

    • drawCenteredString

      static void drawCenteredString(String text, int startX, int startY, int spaceWidth, int colour, char[][] canvas, int[][] canvasColor)
      This method draws a String centered in a certain space
      Parameters:
      text - String to draw centered
      startX - integer representing start horizontal coordinate
      startY - integer representing start vertical coordinate
      spaceWidth - integer representing width of space that the String can occupy
      colour - colour of the String to draw
      canvas - 2d array of characters representing the pixels
      canvasColor - 2d array of integers representing the color of the pixels

    • drawBox

      static void drawBox(int row, int col, int height, int width, int colour, char[][] canvas, int[][] canvasColor)
      This method draws a box based on the parameters
      Parameters:
      row - integer representing start row of the box
      col - integer representing start column of the box
      height - integer representing height of the box
      width - integer representing width of the box
      colour - integer representing color of the box
      canvas - 2d array of characters representing the pixels
      canvasColor - 2d array of integers representing the color of the pixels

      Parameters:
      thisPlayerId - String representing the id of the player
      currentPlayerChat - object containing List of messages of one player
      canvas - 2d array of characters representing the pixels
      canvasColor - 2d array of integers representing the color of the pixels

    • drawShelves

      static void drawShelves(Map<String,Tile[][]> currentShelves, String firstPlayerId, String thisPlayerId, String playerOnTurn, Map<String,? super Integer> pointsValue, char[][] canvas, int[][] canvasColor)
      this method draws the shelves of the players in the game
      Parameters:
      currentShelves - map that associates each playerId to its shelf
      firstPlayerId - ID of the first player
      thisPlayerId - ID of the player who is
      playerOnTurn - ID of the player on turn
      pointsValue - map that associates each playerId to its points
      canvas - 2d array of characters representing the pixels
      canvasColor - 2d array of integers representing the color of the pixels

    • drawCommonGoals

      static void drawCommonGoals(Map<String,Token> commonGoals, Map<String,Token> achievedCommonGoals, char[][] canvas, int[][] canvasColor)
      this method draws the common goal
      Parameters:
      commonGoals - map containing common goal id and common goal info
      achievedCommonGoals - map containing achieved common goals id and token
      canvas - 2d array of characters representing the pixels
      canvasColor - 2d array of integers representing the color of the pixels

      this method retrieves the resource of the common goal
      Parameters:

      Returns:
